sentences.sContent: The judge found that it was not foreseeable that the fuel would catch fire.
sentences.sCn: 法官裁定，燃料着火是无法预料的。

remMethod.val: fore(预先) + see(看见) + able(有能力的) → 有能力预先看见的 → 可预知的

words.tran: 深谋远虑的；有先见之明的；能预料的

trans.tranOther: foreseeable difficulties, events etc should be planned for because they are very likely to happen in the future
